tool.name: FeatureFinderIdentification
tool.description: Detects features in MS1 data based on peptide identifications.
tool.command:
FeatureFinderIdentification
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_id: -id $param_id #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_lib_out: -lib_out $param_lib_out #end if #if $param_chrom_out: -chrom_out $param_chrom_out #end if #if $param_trafo_out: -trafo_out $param_trafo_out #end if #if $param_extract_reference_rt: -extract:reference_rt #end if #if $param_extract_rt_window: -extract:rt_window $param_extract_rt_window #end if #if $param_extract_mz_window: -extract:mz_window $param_extract_mz_window #end if #if $param_extract_isotope_pmin: -extract:isotope_pmin $param_extract_isotope_pmin #end if #if $param_detect_peak_width: -detect:peak_width $param_detect_peak_width #end if #if $param_model_type: -model:type #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_detect_all_features: -detect:all_features #end if #if $adv_opts.param_model_add_zeros: -model:add_zeros $adv_opts.param_model_add_zeros #end if #if $adv_opts.param_model_unweighted_fit: -model:unweighted_fit #end if #if $adv_opts.param_model_no_imputation: -model:no_imputation #end if #if $adv_opts.param_model_check_boundaries: -model:check:boundaries $adv_opts.param_model_check_boundaries #end if #if $adv_opts.param_model_check_width: -model:check:width $adv_opts.param_model_check_width #end if #if $adv_opts.param_model_check_asymmetry: -model:check:asymmetry $adv_opts.param_model_check_asymmetry #end if #end if

param.name: param_extract_reference_rt
param.label: Method for selecting the reference RT, if there are multiple IDs for a peptide and charge
param.help: (-reference_rt) 'adapt': adapt (extend) RT windows based on IDs; 'score': RT of the best-scoring ID; 'intensity': RT of the ID with the most intense precursor; 'median': median RT of all IDs; 'all': no single reference, use RTs of all IDs (requires further processing of results)

param.name: param_extract_rt_window
param.label: RT window size (in sec.) for chromatogram extraction

param.name: param_extract_mz_window
param.label: m/z window size for chromatogram extraction (unit: ppm if 1 or greater, else Da/Th)

param.name: param_extract_isotope_pmin
param.label: Minimum probability for an isotope to be included in the assay for a peptide

param.name: param_detect_peak_width
param.label: Elution peak width in seconds for smoothing (Gauss filter)

param.name: param_model_type
param.label: Type of elution model to fit to features

param.name: param_detect_all_features
param.label: Return all features detected by OpenSWATH for an assay, instead of only the best one
param.help: (-all_features) (This requires further processing of the results.)

param.name: param_model_add_zeros
param.label: Add zero-intensity points outside the feature range to constrain the model fit
param.help: (-add_zeros) This parameter sets the weight given to these points during model fitting; '0' to disable

param.name: param_model_unweighted_fit
param.label: Suppress weighting of mass traces according to theoretical intensities when fitting elution models

param.name: param_model_no_imputation
param.label: If fitting the elution model fails for a feature, set its intensity to zero instead of imputing a value from the initial intensity estimate

param.name: param_model_check_boundaries
param.label: Time points corresponding to this fraction of the elution model height have to be within the data region used for model fitting

param.name: param_model_check_width
param.label: Upper limit for acceptable widths of elution models (Gaussian or EGH), expressed in terms of modified (median-based) z-scores; '0' to disable

param.name: param_model_check_asymmetry
param.label: Upper limit for acceptable asymmetry of elution models (EGH only), expressed in terms of modified (median-based) z-scores; '0' to disable

tool.help:
Detects features in MS1 data based on peptide identifications.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_FeatureFinderIdentification.html
